question: The Union Ministry of Tourism has started 'Paryatan Parv' in ____________ to promote tourism across India.
explanation: The Union Ministry of Tourism has started a festival of Tourism 'Paryatan Parv' from Humayun's Tomb in Delhi from October 5, 2017 & will continue across the country till 25th of this month. The event is being organized by the Ministry of Tourism in collaboration with other Central Ministries, State Governments and Stakeholders. The objective is to draw focus on the benefits of tourism, to showcase the cultural diversity of the country and reinforce the principle of Tourism for All.It will have three main components, Dekho Apna Desh, Tourism for All and Tourism & Governance.
